blood-donation.title: Adventure
blood-donation.description: NCC cadets getting exposure to thrilling adventures

images.caption: CQMS Putta Siddharth excelled in Uttarkashi's Adventure Mountaineering Course (Nov '23), completing a 12km trek to 9,842ft Harunta Bugyal and securing 2nd in cross-country running.
Five SOA NCC cadets completed the Rajgir Trekking Camp (2023), a 10-day expedition covering Nalanda ruins, Viswa Shanti Stupa, Ghora Katora, Nalanda International University, and Giriyak Dam.
